transcript.text: *cool music* I have my ticket to go in "weightless conditions"
Today we're in Bordeaux, and not in Germany.
It is the second part of the video I did in the european space agency
We did an astonaut training
And now we're going in space or rather, in a place simulating the absence of gravity
How are we gonna do that ? I'll explain : we're gonna go aboard this plane behind me
and it will do "parabolas", which means it will go up and down
And there will be a phase when we'll feel earth gravity 1.8 times
For example, instead of weighing 30kg, I'll weigh 60kg. If you really thought I weighed 30kg you're a bastard
That means that it will be quite tough physically
Especially for the inner ear, so I have this little pill
which will actually drug my inner ear,
You know, like the pill you take when you've got travel sickness
it will help a lot during the flight, I have to take it know
Speaking of "Parabola",
It's very simple
At first it's as if you're going to Morocco or the USA next summer
The plane flies in a straight line, where the gravity will feel normal, as if you were on the ground
Then it will start going up, and at that moment, we enter the phase where we'll feel 1.8 times the gravity on Earth
And it's there in the middle of the rise that there will be no gravity.
Well, the purists will say that actually, there is gravity but you just don't really feel it
That will last until the top
and then a little while going down
And there we'll go through 1.8g again
And again and again. We're going to do that 15 times
So I'm going to feel twice earth gravity 15 times
and I'm also going to feel no gravity 15 times
It will be incredible. They planned a lot of things for us to do in the plane. It will be amazing.
Thank you Mass Effect. This will be crazy. Let's go!
Friends, I'm in the plane. We just got debriefed
There is a little poster shedule, right here
So during the first parabolas, we're just going to discover the sensation a little
Because we're still beginners in the field of 0g.
And here we'll be doing Zenyatta, apparently.
Here, they will show us what happens to water in 0g
It will act like spheres. It's very beautiful.
And here we're all going to hold arms.
We'll make a giant ring. They will lift us and make us spin in a circle.
It will be quite impressive
In fact, all the parabolas will be in 0g, except 3. There will be 3 parabolas where it won't be 0g.
One will simulate the gravity of Mars, and we'll use that to do some push ups.
The gravity of Mars is a third of Earth gravity.
And then the two following parabolas will simulate the moon's gravity. It's a sixth of earth gravity.
That means that you will be barely pulled to the ground. So you can do whatever you want: push ups with one finger...
Climb here and do some pull ups. No worries!
It will be the first time of my life that I'm able to do things like a muscular man
And then we'll be able to play with balls!
And it will also be the first time of my life that I'm able to juggle. Incredible!
Vladimir, our monitor, explained to us that when we enter the phase of 1.8g
We will lie on the floor
like sticks so as not to hurt ourselves.
And actually, he told us that we should fix at a certain point
and that if you move your head, the signal that your internal ear will send to your brain will be decoupled. And that will be shitty.
Ok, let's get up and go to the other area. ¡Vamos David!
¡Vamos!
We're at the very front of the plane, right next to the pilots. We'll be lying down soon.
Everyone is vlogging. All around, everyone is vlogging.
Friends, there's a little surprise.
We'll be able to test... a hand spinner that Nozman lent me
What will happen to the hand spinner in 0g?
We'll be seeing soon! Oh I'm adding suspense to the video!
-Are you excited? You can't wait?  -Ah yes, yes!
And Vladimir was just dancing a moment ago!
Friends, it's time to lie down! I'll get back to  you right away!
I'm supposed to put my hands by my side along my body
I'll have to leave you! Bye!
Okay guys! We're flying! We're weightless!
It's crazy!
Guys, this is crazy!
I can turn around myself!
Even when we're trying to lie down, we fall very quickly!
It's as if everything is a lot quicker in 2g.
It's impressive! I feel completely hollow!
It's as if you were more alive. It's very weird!
Actually, when you're in 0g and you barely push against the ground,
You fly off instantly!
And nobody was expecting that, so we all flew right into the ceiling.
I have absolutely no word to describe what I feel. It's simply incredible.
It's been millions of years that humans have lived with gravity
that even our brain is not ready for this
Even in 2g, the sensation is incredible!
Are you ready for lift-off?
Let's go!
Okay there's no gravity. We're flying.
Okay I'm trying to control myself a little...
I'm not going to lie to you...
I'm turning around myself!
I don't care, I'm a monkey!
- I think he's dying! Are you dying?
- Yes! I lost my bubble gum!
I have David's camera, and he has mine!
This is happening very quickly! We're already in the 4th parabola.
My friends, I am speechless.
In fact, I absolutely cannot control my movements.
We spend months learning how to walk, and here it's like we're back at square zero.
We'll be by this side of the plane, and they will throw water at us. It will be amazing.
Oh!! Amazing!
It's okay. Fuck that falls instantly.
That was one of the most beautiful things that I've ever seen.
Water that flys! It sounds stupid but it's so beautiful! It's amazing!
In the next parabola, we'll use the hand spinner.
Let's go!
It's crazy!
It doesn't fall! Oh shit!
It's crazy!
It falls a little but not a lot!
Well we've seen what happens to a hand spinner in the air!
We're in the middle of the flight. We're going to make the ring now.
We're all going to stick together and they will turn us around ourselves.
Guys,
You are all thinkig that I've got no muscles
Well you're wrong and i'm going to prove it
Who is the one without any muscle?!
Easy, no problem
I can scratch my head too.
With one finger !
Come on who's the one without muscles !
I want to live on Mars
And now we're passing on to the lunar simulation.
That means that you'll weigh a sixth of your usual weight.
You fly, but not too much.
Here we go!
Watch me do a backflip!
It's unbelievable!
Guys, we're going to try to walk in 2g. I must contract my leg muscles as much as possible to be able to do that.
Here we go.
All my blood is going to my legs my friends! It's crazy.
I'm gonna try to go up.
And here we are guys. On the ceiling!
You okay?
It's the last 2 or 3 parabolas. I'm very sad. I have only just begun to learn how control my movements.
We'll be able to play with balls! I'm going to show you how fast the ball falls in 2g.
So this is Earth's gravity. And now look, we're passing into 2g.
Here we go! 2g!
Look how fast it falls!
What's happening makes no sense at all!
Alright, we're going to sit on the ceiling.
And here we are. We're sitting on the ceiling! It's incredible!
My head currently weighs 20 kilos. We can say that I've gotten a big head!!
It's incredible! Especially with the flying balls!
Vladimir told me about this dangerous game.
We'll be playing the game of death. It's the last one! We'll do it together?
We'll be playing the game of death with Vladimir.
We'll be standing up holding each other's hands, and then we'll let ourselves fall forward.
(Vladimir) - We won't be holding each other!
Yes, Yes! Of course we'll hold each other, Vladimir!
We'll let ourselves fall forward while we're in 2g. And we're going to pray that the 0g phase will happen before we hit the ground.
You're ready?
I'm very scared. If we fail, we'll hit the ground violently...
Anyways, I'm following you. The moment you start falling, I'll do the same!
Alright, tell me when to start falling.
It's already difficult to stay standing up!
OH FUCK!
OH FUCK!
Oh fuck we failed!
Oh shit!
He did it on purpose! I hit the ground so hard! Oh shit...
It's over?
Thanks pilot!
Incredible! Incredible!
My friends, it's over. It's time to go.
I can barely wrap my head around what I went through today. It was... just awesome.
I really hope that I succeeded in passing along to you what I felt during this flight,
thanks to this little GoPro.
It's... I cannot describe it: the feeling that it gives you. It's beyond what you can imagine, actually.
Anyways, thanks to all of you. It's thanks to you that I was able to do this 0g flight.
Thanks Electronic Arts for having sent me here,
and thanks to to the Novespace team, who were absolutely adorable and who gave us confidence
because you know, I'm usually afraid of flying, and I think that this time, I was the least afraid in all my life.
I really wasn't scared at all. I was perfectly serene.
And I think that that helped me handle the flight itself, because it's really tiring. I mean you're in 1.8g,
then in 0g, then in 1.8g, then in 0g. Your body has to adapt each time, and it's very tiring.
Right now I'm very tired.
I think that I'm going to dream about this tonight.
They actually told us "You'll see, you're going to dream about this tonight. It's crazy."
It's that... you fly. You just fly. It's incredible.
And now I just want to see the video and try to feel again what I felt in the play, but I know I won't be able to. It's impossible.
I'm going to say see you soon. I'll rest on this pole like a loser.
Thank you for everything, and thanks for watching this video. Don't hesitate to like it if you enjoyed it.
See you soon! Goodbye!
